title: From US to India, Zachary and his expat story
description: More and more people move abroad looking for new opportunities, they choose the place based on what they like the most, as well as where love or a job will bring them.  I'm always amazed by all the stories I hear and come across with. That's why today I want to share with all of you Zachary's expat life, who moved from US to India.  Here's his story.
